Description: You've been asked to find a certain person imprisoned in Dahut.
AvailableAt: Wrack begins this story and Dahut continues it.
LevelDescriptionText: 1|Asked to seek and free a prisoner in Dahut~10|Freed a prisoner of Dahut~20|Delivered a prisoner of Dahut to Rosegate~30|Reported back to the Composer at Wrack that the Dahut Prisoner was set free~2|Begun asking about a prisoner in Dahut~15|Brought a Dahut Prisoner to visit her friend in Wrack~3|Saw a prisoner in the Crypt
Name: Dahut: Seeking a Prisoner of Dahut
